title: Herring gull behaviour
creator_credit: Education Development Center and James G. Schaadt
brief_description: This documentary charts the life of the herring gull, a seabird. Focusing on its life within its natural habitat, the film looks at such things as the behavioural characteristics of the herring gull. These include: feeding habits, mating rituals, breeding habits etc.
creator_credit_for_label: Education Development Center and James G. Schaadt
